Author: lunarexlipse21
Text: yes right now i’m on the verge of a meltdown ‘cause my friend got us both bowls of icecream, and i’m there thinking it’s a certain brand she normally has that feels sort of safe. so i allowed myself to finish it. later i walked over to the kitchen to get some water, opened the freezer, and it was full fat ice cream with a ridiculous amount of calories for one serving. i get you lol
